means: 黑人血统有八分之一的混血儿

PerfectNetExp.abs: octopush 水中曲棍球octoroon 混血儿octosyllabic 八音节的
别名猎水獭犬（octoroon），荷兰猎鹬犬（dutch spaniel）。 毛色类型
octoroon是什么意思,octoroon的解释:n. 有八分之一黑人血统的混血儿【医】 八分混种, 八分杂种,octoroon中英例句,英汉词典。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from octo- 'eight', on the pattern of quadroon

means.word_mean: 1. an offspring of a Quadroon and a White parent; a person who is one-eighth Black

auth_sentence.content: Harriet Hemings had seven white great-grandparents; she was, in the idiom of the time, an octoroon.
auth_sentence.res_content: Harriet Hemings had seven white great-grandparents; she was, in the idiom of the time, an octoroon.

auth_sentence.content: Before I left the beach that day, someone told me that Broyard was rumored to be an octoroon.
